items.content_html: The Counter App is a lightweight and versatile application designed to provide users with a simple way to track counts for various purposes. Whether you're monitoring your daily habits, keeping score in games, or managing inventory, this app offers a seamless experience tailored to your counting needs
items.title: UzairHassan409/Counter_App: The Counter App is a lightweight and versatile application designed to provide users with a simple way to track counts for various purposes. Whether you're monitoring your daily habits, keeping score in games, or managing inventory, this app offers a seamless experience tailored to your counting needs

items.content_html: This Weather App is a lightweight and responsive web application built with React.js that provides users with real-time weather updates for any location worldwide. The app fetches data from a weather API and displays crucial information like the current temperature, humidity, and wind speed.
items.title: Dhruvaryan-10/Weather-App: This Weather App is a lightweight and responsive web application built with React.js that provides users with real-time weather updates for any location worldwide. The app fetches data from a weather API and displays crucial information like the current temperature, humidity, and wind speed.
